title: Episode 144: Tom and Erika Girardi, The Hustler and the Housewife - Part 1
description:
Plane crashes. Gas explosions. Poisoned waters. People facing the worst moments of their lives all turned to one man who promised to solve their problems. Then they watched as his lavish lifestyle with his wife played out on their TVs every week without knowing that the money paying for it all belonged to them.
